resources.string: Domoticz is a very light weight home automation system that lets you monitor and configure various devices.
You can add devices to the Dashboard by saving them as favorites. Long click an item to save them as favorite!
You can set your startup screen in the settings!
You can set your startup screen in the settings!
You can specify which switches you would like to control from your Android wear device!
You can see the history graph of an Utility, Weather or Temperature!
You can filter devices per status (on/off). Check the right upper menu icon for filtering!
You can put some widgets on your home screen!
